get.summary: Returns a list of VM IDs and paths for all VMs

post.summary: Creates a copy of the VM

get.summary: Returns the VM setting information of a VM
Returns the power state of the VM

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: VM power operation: on, off, shutdown, suspend, pause, unpause

get.summary: Returns all shared folders mounted in the VM

200.description: Shared folders mounted in the VM

post.summary: Mounts a new shared folder in the VM

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters of the shared folder to mount

201.description: Shared folders mounted in the VM

put.summary: Updates a shared folder mounted in the VM

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters of the shared folder to update to

200.description: Shared folders mounted in the VM

get.summary: Returns all network adapters in the VM

post.summary: Creates a network adapter in the VM

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters of network adapter to create

201.description: Information of the network adapter created

put.summary: Updates a network adapter in the VM

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters of network adapter to update to

200.description: Information of the network adapter updated to

get.summary: Returns the IP address of a VM
Returns all MAC-to-IP settings for DHCP service

parameters.name: vmnet
parameters.description: Virtual network that has DHCP enabled

parameters.name: mac
parameters.description: Mac address that want to be mapped with a given IP

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: IP that will be assigned to given Mac address. If empty IP, the original Mac to IP binding will be deleted

folder_id.description: ID of folder which be mounted to the host

host_path.description: Path of the host shared folder

flags.description:
The flags property specifies how the folder will be accessed by the VM.
There is only one flag supported which is "4" and means read/write access.

SharedFolders.description: The shared folders mounted to this VM

host_path.description: Path of the host shared folder

flags.description:
The flags property specifies how the folder will be accessed by the VM.
There is only one flag supported which is "4" and means read/write access.

type.description: The network type of network adapter

nics.description: The network adapter added to this VM

type.description: The network type of network adapter

vmnet.description: The vmnet name, it should only be used while type is custom

MACToIPs.description: The list of MAC to IP settings

mactoips.description: The list of MAC to IP settings

IP.dscription: IP that will be assiged to given Mac
